name: The Developer (itch) (Created_by_a_guy)
description:
The evil from the rise of corruption have stolen devices where humans could code their own programs with. Those are now lost. Go and get the lost technology.

The objective is to kill the evil robots in the least amount of time to get a high score, when you're done find a device and pass to the next level.

Made for the Godot Wild Game Jam #35.

CONTROLS:

· Move with WASD.

· Aim/look at, with the mouse cursor.

· Left click to shoot (when unblocked).

· Right click for sword/melee attack.

· R to restart levels
